edu.uw.spl.account

Class AccountManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.spl.account.AccountManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountManager

    public class AccountManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountManager
    Manages interactions, such as adds, updates, or deletes, between accounts and the DAO. Additionally encrypts new accounts' passwords into a byte[]
    Author:
    slajaunie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      AccountManagerImpl()
      Instantiates a new account manager

        public void close()
           throws edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException

      • createAccount

        public edu.uw.ext.framework.account.Account createAccount(java.lang.String accountName,
                                                          java.lang.String password,
                                                          int balance)
                                                   throws edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException
        Creates a new account and persists it via the DAO to the file directory. The DAO will determine if this is a duplicate account to an account that already exists, and if so, will throw an AccountException
        Specified by:
        createAccount in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountManager
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account to add
        password - the password used to gain access to the account
        balance - the initial balance of the account, in cents
        Returns:
        the newly created account
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException - if the account is a duplicate of an account that already exists, or otherwise unable to create an account

      • deleteAccount

        public void deleteAccount(java.lang.String accountName)
                   throws edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException
        Removes the account from the directory via the DAO
        Specified by:
        deleteAccount in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountManager
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account to remove
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException - if the operation failed

      • getAccount

        public edu.uw.ext.framework.account.Account getAccount(java.lang.String accountName)
                                                throws edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException
        Lookup an account based on the given account name, and returns that account, or null if the account was not located in the directory
        Specified by:
        getAccount in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountManager
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account to retrieve
        Returns:
        the account associated with the given account name, or null if the account was not located in the directory
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException - if the operation failed

      • validateLogin

        public boolean validateLogin(java.lang.String accountName,
                             java.lang.String password)
                      throws edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException
        Checks whether a login is valid. The Account must be located in the directory and the password must match the stored password
        Specified by:
        validateLogin in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountManager
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account to validate
        password - the password on the given account
        Returns:
        true if the login was validated, otherwise false
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountException - if the given account could not be located
